Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The aim of this study is to show that FPD from MEA ( Multielectrode array ) of hiPS - CMs can detect QT prolongation induced by multichannel blockers .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the disease entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| FPD (Fundamental Physiological Dysfunction) |
| MEA (Multielectrode Array) |
| hiPS (Human Induced Pluripotent Stem) |
| CMs (Cardiomyocytes) |
| QT prolongation |
| Multichannel blockers |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the disease entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| QT prolongation |

The other entities in the paragraph (e.g. "MEA", "hiPS", "CMs") do not clearly refer to a disease, so they have been excluded from the table.
